content:
User: C:\AI-Execution-System>curl -X POST -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d "{\"task_description\": \"Summarize the plot of the movie 'Inception' in three sentences.\"}" https://us-central1-ai-execution-system.cloudfunctions.net/ai-system-backend {"error": "Exception in execute_task: module 'google.cloud.aiplatform' has no attribute 'TextGenerationModel'"} C:\AI-Execution-System>

Gemini: THE PROBLEM IS INDEED IN main.py - WE ARE USING aiplatform.TextGenerationModel.from_pretrained(...) WHICH IS INCORRECT!

CORRECTION: The correct class name for the PaLM 2 Text Generation Model in the google-cloud-aiplatform Python library is TextModel!

LET'S UPDATE main.py with the CORRECT CLASS NAME!

STEP 1: MODIFY main.py - CORRECT CLASS NAME to TextModel

Please OPEN main.py in your CODE EDITOR again.

FIND THIS LINE in your execute_task function:

generation_model = aiplatform.TextGenerationModel.from_pretrained("text-bison@001")
REPLACE it with this corrected line:

generation_model = aiplatform.TextModel.from_pretrained("text-bison@001")
CHANGE ONLY TextGenerationModel to TextModel. The rest of the line should remain the same.

AFTER MAKING THIS CHANGE, PLEASE SAVE main.py.

STEP 2: RE-DEPLOY the Cloud Function with the CORRECTED main.py

EXECUTE the SAME gcloud functions deploy COMMAND again in your terminal:

gcloud functions deploy ai-system-backend --runtime python310 --entry-point execute_task --trigger-http --allow-unauthenticated --region us-central1
IMPORTANT: We are using the same deployment command, just re-deploying with the corrected main.py file.
STEP 3: RE-TEST the ECHO TASK (now AI Task) using the SAME curl command as before:

curl -X POST -H "Content-Type: application/json" -d "{\"task_description\": \"Summarize the plot of the movie 'Inception' in three sentences.\"}" https://us-central1-ai-execution-system.cloudfunctions.net/ai-system-backend
WE ARE NOW EXPECTING THIS TIME TO GET THE CORRECT JSON RESPONSE with the ai_response containing the summary of "Inception" generated by the PaLM 2 model!

PLEASE MAKE THE CODE CHANGE in main.py, SAVE IT, RE-DEPLOY, and then RUN THE curl TEST COMMAND AGAIN!

REPORT BACK IMMEDIATELY after running the curl command with the TERMINAL OUTPUT and whether you see the EXPECTED JSON RESPONSE with the AI-generated summary!

LET'S CRUSH THIS ERROR AND GET OUR AI TASK EXECUTOR WORKING! GO! GO! GO! FOCUS! EXECUTE! NEXT! WE ARE SO CLOSE!

Logo for Gemini Apps
Gemini Apps
